oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A modified approach of feeding regenerative energy to the mains
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAHA, S
DANDEKAR, AV
SUNDERSINGH, VP
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A modified approach of injecting the regenerated energy from a 3 - phi ac squirrel cage induction motor drive system, during its braking operation, sinusoidally into the 3 - phi supply using a feedback inverter between the thyristor rectifier bridge and the 3 - phi inverter block is described, The validity of the modified scheme is verified by simulation and experiment.
